_header: Jesu Christ our Lord so sweet
_description: Gospel for Saturday after Third Sunday in Lent, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle — in couplets

BLHar4196.First Lines: Ihesu crist oure lord so sweteWent to þe mount of olyuete…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …þat lord be loued with more & lesþat so may wirk what his will es
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Parexit ihesu crist in montem Oliueti.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: Sabbato post terciam dominicam quadragesime Secundum Iohannem (rubric, f. 52vb)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): II.90-93.
